name: Spanglish Crossword
description:
A English/Spanish-language crossword game made by three JCCC students in February 2018:

Edward Robrahn (programmer)

Nemesis Torres (puzzle design)

Dashiell Reid (UI design)

For the inquisitive, there is a puzzle editor you can access with the ',' (comma) key- you can only replace the puzzles in the spanglishcrossword_Data/puzzle folder, however.

This game is considered finished and unsupported.
